text: Lutrogale was proposed as generic name by John Edward Gray in 1865 for otters with a convex forehead and nose, using the smooth-coated otter L. perspicillata as type species. The genus also contains the following extinct and fossil species: *L. cretensis – Cretan otter *L. palaeoleptonyx *L. robusta ==References== Category:Otters Category:Mammal genera Category:Taxa named by John Edward Gray
title: Lutrogale
